metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4471 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Off-by-one error in the lzxd_decompress function in lzxd.c in libmspackbefore 0.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (bufferunder-read and application crash) via a crafted CAB archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4471` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmspack0 - 0.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

cabextract - 1.4-4ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libmspack package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
cabextract package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4-4ubuntu0.1~esm1').
